name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.166.0
- Added 5 new cards: Trap Hole, Swords of Revealing Light, Time Wizard, Bottomless Trap Hole, Sword of Deep-Seated
- Improved Gravity Axe, Axe of Despair card and power logic
- Buffed Mountain and Yami
- Completely changed Radiant Mirror Force effect
- Toon Barrel Dragon now deals damage through block
- Nutrient Z cannot be played unless you have <40 HP
- Updated Thunder Dragon card text to reflect Lightning orb channel on Dragon Tribute
- Changed several card rarities
- Dark Magician Girl & Toon DM Girl no longer have Overflow effects
- Magnet Warrior card texts now reflect that the magnet powers last for the whole combat
- Shard of Greed now draws 1 extra card EVERY turn, and 2 extra cards every 3 turns



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
